name: MetricTime
0:
”Alexa, open metric time”
”Alexa, ask metric time to tell me the time in metric”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metric time
des:
Alexa can now tell you the time in metric time.

In metric time one day is 10 hours where each hour is 100 minutes long and each minute has 100 seconds. There is no AM and PM and all times are given based on UTC.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
